mapper.select: select to_char(bpaydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bpaydate, sum(bfinalmoney) from bpayment where TRUNC(bpaydate) BETWEEN TO_DATE(sysdate-3) AND TO_DATE(sysdate) group by bpaydate order by bpaydate

select to_char(bpaydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bpaydate, sum(bfinalmoney) from bpayment, paymentbook where bpayment.bpaynum = paymentbook.bpaynum and btype = 1 and bstatus in (3,5) and group by bpaydate order by bpaydate

select to_char(bpaydate,'yyyy-mm') bpaydate, sum(bfinalmoney) from bpayment, paymentbook where bpayment.bpaynum = paymentbook.bpaynum and btype = 1 and bstatus in (3,5) and group by to_char(bpaydate,'yyyy-mm') order by bpaydate

select to_char(bpaydate, 'IW') bpaydate, sum(bfinalmoney) from bpayment, paymentbook where bpayment.bpaynum = paymentbook.bpaynum and btype = 1 and bstatus in (3,5) and group by to_char(bpaydate, 'IW') order by bpaydate
select to_char(feedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') feedate, sum(feepay) from obcomplete where group by feedate order by feedate
select to_char(feedate,'yyyy-mm') feedate, sum(feepay) from obcomplete where group by to_char(feedate,'yyyy-mm') order by feedate
select to_char(feedate, 'IW') feedate, sum(feepay) from obcomplete where group by to_char(feedate, 'IW') order by feedate

select to_char(bpaydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bpayment, sum(bfinalmoney) price, methodpayment, nvl(count(methodpayment),0) count from bpayment where TRUNC(bpaydate) BETWEEN TO_DATE(sysdate-3) AND TO_DATE(sysdate) group by bpaydate, methodpayment order by bpaydate, methodpayment
